import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '' }, errors: {}, skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '' }) const [ education, setEducation ] = useState({ college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '' }) const [ codingProfile, setCodingProfile ] = useState({ cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }) const [ errors, setErrors ] = useState({ cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() setErrors([]) try { const res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${codingProfile.cfUserName}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ setErrors({ ...errors, cfUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codeforces username' }) } const res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${codingProfile.ccUserName}`) if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ setErrors({ ...errors, ccUserNameError: 'Please enter valid codechef username' }) } //console.log(errors.cfUserNameError) console.log(res1.data.status) console.log(res2.data.status) } catch( error ) { console.log(error.response) } } return (

My account

onSubmit(e) } >
Education and Profesional Details
setEducation({...education, college: e.target.value}) } />
setEducation({...education, degree: e.target.value}) } />
setEducation({...education, branch: e.target.value}) } />
setEducation({...education, batch: e.target.value}) } />
setProfile({...profile, company: e.target.value}) } />

setProfile({...profile, skills: e.target.value}) }/>
Coding Platform information
setCodingProfile({...codingProfile, cfUserName: e.target.value}) } />
setCodingProfile({...codingProfile, ccUserName: e.target.value}) } />
Social information
setProfile({ ...profile, portfolio: e.target.value }) } />
setProfile({ ...profile, linkedIn: e.target.value }) } />
setProfile({ ...profile, instagram: e.target.value }) } />
setProfile({ ...profile, twitter: e.target.value }) } />
setProfile({ ...profile, facebook: e.target.value }) } />


) } export default AddProfile;
